RMIGameOfNim

Class GameServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • RMIGameOfNim.GameServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, GameEngineRemoteInterface

    public class GameServer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements GameEngineRemoteInterface
    GameServer which implements the remote interface GameEngineInterface It controls the main flow of the game and takes input from the players
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:
        Message to both players once the move has been successfully made, otherwise tells the user that their move was invalid
